key.name: alpha-channel-enabled
key.summary: Whether the alpha channel is enabled
key.description: Whether the alpha channel is enabled. Must be enabled for changing the transparency of the background of the graph window.

key.name: background-alpha
key.summary: The alpha value of the background of the graph window
key.description: The alpha value of the background of the graph window. It must be a positive float between 0 and 1. '1' is the maximum opacity.

key.name: background-color
key.summary: The color of the background of the graph canvas
key.description: The color of the background of the graph canvas as a #rgb representation.

key.name: foreground-color
key.summary: The color of the foreground of the graph canvas
key.description: The color of the foreground of the graph canvas as a #rgb representation.

key.name: monitoring-duration
key.summary: The monitoring duration of the graph
key.description: The monitoring duration of the graph as minutes. It must be greater than 1.

key.name: update-interval
key.summary: The interval between refreshs of the graph
key.description: The interval between refreshs of the graph as seconds. It must be greater than 1.

key.name: hide-on-startup
key.summary: Whether the graph window is hidden on startup
key.description: Whether the graph window is hidden on startup. The graph will be hidden only if the Ubuntu Application Indicator or status icon support is available.

key.name: menu-bar-disabled
key.summary: Whether the menu of the graph window is disabled
key.description: Whether the menu of the graph window is disabled

key.name: sensorlist-position
key.summary: Position of the sensor list in the graph window
key.description: Position of the sensor list in the graph window. Possible values are 0 (right), 1 (left), 2 (top), 3 (bottom).

key.name: unity-launcher-count-disabled
key.summary: Whether the greatest temperature is displayed in Unity launcher
key.description: If set to 'true' the greatest temperature will be displayed in the Unity launcher.

key.name: temperature-unit
key.description: The displayed temperature unit, '0' for Celsius, '1' for Fahenrenheit.

key.name: window-decoration-disabled
key.summary: Whether the decoration of the window is disabled
key.description: Whether the decoration of the window is disabled.

key.name: window-keep-below-enabled
key.summary: Whether the graph window is kept below all other windows
key.description: Whether the graph window is kept below all other windows.

key.name: window-restore-enabled
key.summary: Whether the position and size of the graph window are restored
key.description: Whether the position and size of the graph window are restored

key.name: window-divider-pos
key.summary: Position of the divider between the graph window and the list of sensors
key.description: Position of the divider between the graph window and the list of sensors

key.name: window-x
key.summary: Horizontal position of the graph window
key.description: Horizontal position of the graph window.

key.name: window-y
key.summary: Vertical position of the graph window
key.description: Vertical position of the graph window.
